test.query: with 'Many years later as he faced the firing squad, Colonel Aureliano Buendia was to remember that distant afternoon when his father took him to discover ice.' as s select splitByChar(' ', materialize(s)) as w from numbers(930000)

with 'Many years later as he faced the firing squad, Colonel Aureliano Buendia was to remember that distant afternoon when his father took him to discover ice.' as s select splitByRegexp(' ', materialize(s)) as w from numbers(190000)

with 'Many years later as he faced the firing squad, Colonel Aureliano Buendia was to remember that distant afternoon when his father took him to discover ice.' as s select splitByRegexp('\s+', materialize(s)) as w from numbers(19000)
